summary: This document is an email chain from September 2019 regarding the physical delivery of a public letter related to the Epstein case to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. It involves a paralegal specialist coordinating a drop-off time.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.role: Paralegal Specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office
persons.context: The individual is coordinating the delivery of a public letter regarding the Epstein case to their office, arranging a drop-off time via email.

events.title: Coordination for Epstein letter delivery
events.description: Email exchange arranging a time for a paralegal specialist to drop off a physical copy of a public letter related to the Epstein case at the U.S. Attorney's Office.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated September 20-23, 2019.
It concerns the delivery of a public letter related to the Epstein case to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
A paralegal specialist is coordinating the physical drop-off of the letter.
The correspondence indicates ongoing administrative handling of public input regarding the Epstein case in September 2019.
The email participants' names are redacted, indicated by placeholders like 'wrote:'.
